title: Prostate cancer detection using deep neural Networks
description: Built an Attention U-Net model for prostate cancer segmentation from MRI scans, using k-fold cross-validation and medical imaging preprocessing.

title: Prostate segmentation using U-Net arhitecture
description: Developed a U-Net model for prostate segmentation from MRI scans, achieving high accuracy and robustness.

title: Portofolio Website
description: A simple website to showcase my skills and my journey.

title: Curabot
description: An AI-powered robotic arm that assists immobilized patients. The system integrates voice recognition, computer vision using a residual CNN on Raspberry Pi, and robotic control via Arduino and Braccio arm.
